casebody.data:
TAYLOR
v.
LEWIS 301P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 2, 2016 Michael Anthony Taylor, for Taylor, Michael Anthony. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of August 2016 by Petitioner to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of September 2016."
